title: Caravan club sandwich
ingredients: ['margarine as needed', '3 slices bread', '4 slices Danish salami', 'good few slices onion', '1 tablespoon low fat mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon mint sauce', '1 slice mature Cheddar cheese', '4 slices cucumber', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'crisps of your choice, to serve']
